Name: BoozeBall
About the game: BoozeBall is a casual game where you will aim and throw a ball at variety of cups attempting to land the ball into the cups, whilst competing against a computer player for the highest score. You play against a computer player with infinite levels and procedural cup layouts. Your goal is to get a higher score than your opponent to progress through the levels. Higher levels will result in the computer player becoming more difficult to beat. Enjoy the relaxing beach levels at different times of day and weather, with realistic lighting as you play through the infinite levels.
